channel.title: Clarity on mastermind investigate
channel.description:
what exactly are the results for various investigatives on turn 1 to 3 ?
good king sees ....... neutral king sees ...... evil king sees ...... observer peak sees ..... sherifff sees ...... princess sees ......
it's still not really clear .
like wise when fool or scorned make someone suspicious . that's not clearly defined either .

item.title: Clarity on mastermind investigate
item.dc:creator: newarkinvaders
item.description:
Well something that is very obvious and clear and nobody has a definitive answer for in particular evil and neutral kings .

Read full topic

item.title: Clarity on mastermind investigate
item.dc:creator: Sketch
item.description:
Mastermind, Night 1, 2 and 3 look like:

Good King: Ally
Neutral King: I have no idea. Probably Blue Dragon.
Evil King: I have no idea. Probably Blue Dragon.
Observer Peek: Blue Dragon
Sheriff: Not suspicious
Princess: Special/Investigative

I’m not 100% on the Princess result actually. Special/Investigative isn’t necessarily DAMNING of a result.

Framed targets look like:

Good King: Not an ally
Neutral King: (I have no idea,I’d imagine Unseen/Cult)
Evil King: Ally
Observer Peak: Unseen/Cult
Sheriff: Unseen
Princess: Killer/Offensive

Read full topic

item.title: Clarity on mastermind investigate
item.dc:creator: newarkinvaders
item.description:
oh doesn’t that give it a way a bit to the kings . after all normally a good king would get ally or not ally .
Also a neutral king sees them normally as there alignment and an evil king sees as allys or not allys .
wouldn’t them getting a message of not suspicious be a bit of a give away …

seeing as in most cases only a sheriff or Saladin would get a not suspicious result

Read full topic

item.title: Clarity on mastermind investigate
item.dc:creator: Vandalay
item.description:
newarkinvaders:

good king sees …

neutral king sees …

evil king sees …

observer peak sees …

sherifff sees …

princess sees …

it’s still not really clear .

like wise when fool or scorned make someone suspicious . that’s not clearly defined either .

I believe all kings see BD (not 100% sure on evil), sheriff sees Not sus, observer see’s BD, princess see’s spec/inv.

For a framed (either fool self or scorneds target)
Good king see’s - Not ally
Neut king see’s - Cult/Unseen (whichever is in the game)
Obs - Cult/unseen
Sheriff see’s Unseen
Princess see’s Killer/offensive.

Read full topic

item.title: Clarity on mastermind investigate
item.dc:creator: TryphonX
item.description:
EVERYONE sees the MM as ns in the first 3 nights. It couldn’t be more clear.

Read full topic
